body.p: A new Unreal Tournament 2003 GameCD has been released and is available here as well as at similar locations on our various mirrors -- choose one near you.

This latest CD includes a highly-optimized gaming kernel (really helps gameplay,) latest NVIDIA drivers (1.0.4349) with GeForce FX support, preliminary bootsplash support, full autodetection of all hardware (sound/input/network,) countless other enhancements and the latest ut2003-demo build. This GameCD requires a modern NVIDIA graphics card to run ut2003-demo. Enjoy!

If you have a modern NVIDIA graphics card and want to play ut2003-demo on your existing Gentoo Linux system, then simply type emerge ut2003-demo and then type ut2003-demo to start the game. I recommend using a gaming-sources kernel for excellent gaming performance and responsiveness.
